actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other Committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

official_title: A bill to amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to combat waste, fraud, and abuse in the medicare program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Medicare Protection Act of 1995 - Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) with respect to discretionary spending limits by establishing limitations on adjustments to Medicare administrative costs for FY 1995 through 2000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to combat waste, fraud, and abuse in the medicare program, and for other purposes.
